Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.visitor

Class ScoreCalculatorWithBonusVisitor

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.visitor.ScoreCalculatorVisitor
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.visitor.ScoreCalculatorWithBonusVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoardVisitor
public class ScoreCalculatorWithBonusVisitor
extends ScoreCalculatorVisitor
Represent one of the different variants to calculate the score for the game. This one have use a scaled score It implements IBoard Visitor to follow the visitor's construction.
